Author: Taurenkey, NightmareXIV, kawaii
Name: Artisan
Punchline: A 'simple' crafting plugin.
Description: The all-in-one crafting plugin. Perfect for people with next to no knowledge about crafting rotations. No need for a library of different macros, the solvers will work dynamically to try and complete your crafts. Also provides convenient ways to craft lists of items or grind out a specific item repeatedly.
Changelog: - UI fixes (by PhoenixtheII)

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: Orbwalker
Punchline: S P A C E G L I D I N G
Description: Locks player movement while casting and allows for maximum caster uptime during the course of a fight.
Changelog: - Fix overlay

Author: Taurenkey, NightmareXIV, Gidedin
Name: LazyLoot
Punchline: Dungeon Loot but Lazy.
Description:
Roll command with various arguments need | needonly | greed | pass | passall. 
Chat and Toast output and delay for rolling.
Changelog: - 7.3 update

Author: Taurenkey, NightmareXIV, croizat
Name: Pandora's Box
Punchline: Do you dare to open Pandora's Box?
Description:
Pandora's Box is a collection of major QoL tweaks and adjustments.

Open the box with /pandora
Changelog: - Update island sanctuary checks

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: Avarice
Punchline: Positional feedback with pixel perfect rear/flank tracking, range indicators, and more.
Description: Positional feedback with pixel perfect rear/flank tracking, range indicators, and more.

Author: kawaii, jukka
Name: Palace Pal
Punchline: Shows possible trap & Accursed Hoard locations in Palace of The Dead, Heaven on High, and Eureka Orthos.
Description:
Shows possible trap & Accursed Hoard locations in Palace of The Dead, Heaven on High, and Eureka Orthos.

This plugin requires Splatoon in order to render various draws on the screen.

Author: Taurenkey, NightmareXIV
Name: Saucy
Punchline: When working for MGP is too much effort.
Description: Automates certain Gold Saucer mini-games.
Changelog:
- Mini cactpot fixes (by Jaksuhn)
- Triple triad stop command (by  t0mball)

Author: Team Wrath
Name: Wrath Combo
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button - and then some.
Description: Turns one action into many! Similar to how PvP actions work, we take an action and build a whole combo out of it. Sometimes it's as simple as a 1-2-3 combo, other times it's a full job rotation. Either way, you'll find something suited for your rotation needs.
Changelog: Please check the project's GitHub or Discord for a full changelog.

Author: kawaii, NightmareXIV
Name: AutoRetainer
Punchline: Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.
Description: Collect and assign ventures to your retainers from the comfort of your bed.
Changelog:
- Issue that made entrusting items to retainers fail was resolved
- Entrusting, selling and discarding use random delay now

Author: Det, Taurenkey
Name: AutoHook
Punchline: Makes fishing less (or more) boring
Description:
It hooks the fish for you, can you believe it?

CN API 10: Enable testing version or use
https://puni.sh/api/repository/det

Author: daemitus, kawaii
Name: Yes Already
Punchline: Clicks Yes in various dialogs you've specified.
Description: Tired of clicking yes in Praetorium? Can't stand using keys in dungeons? Well do I have the plugin for you! Yes Already is specifically designed to click all the annoying dialogs you've grown accustomed facerolling. Just enter the dialog text, and you'll never see it again! Also works with /regex/ and has several built-in modules for dialogs that aren't quite yes/no prompts but act like it (like desynth).

Author: NightmareXIV, Xenosys
Name: Splatoon
Punchline: Redefining FFXIV navigation with unlimited, precise waymarks.
Description: Splatoon is a powerful accessibility tool. It revolutionizes gameplay with its custom waymark system, offering the ability to create unlimited grouped waymarks, labels, and actor indicators with exacting pixel precision. This feature empowers players by making crucial objects and events more visually discernible, thereby facilitating quicker reactions. However, it's important to note that the plugin does not come pre-loaded with presets. Players have the freedom to craft their own or import existing ones, offering a personalized touch to their gaming experience.
Changelog: - Added filter by layout's zone

Author: NightmareXIV, akechi
Name: Questionable
Punchline: A tiny quest helper plugin.
Description:
A tiny little quest helper plugin, which does quests for you automatically where possible. Uses navmesh to automatically walk to all quest waypoints, and tries to automatically complete all steps along the way (excluding dungeons, single player duties and combat).

Not all quests are supported, check the discord or git repository for an up-to-date list.

Required Plugins: vnavmesh, TextAdvance, Lifestream
Changelog: - [7.3][Alliance Raid] The Second Walk and Post Quests by MrGuffels

Author: attick, daemitus, Khayle
Name: XIV Combo Expanded
Punchline: Condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button.
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. For example, a 1-2-3 combo would become 1-1-1.

Author: Aida Enna
Name: Auto Login
Description: Automatically logs you into a specified character when the game first opens.
Changelog: - Updated for patch 7.3

Author: Aida Enna
Name: Auto Pillion
Punchline: Automatically ride on other people's mounts!
Description:
When a party member gets on a mount that supports more than 1 person and is close enough, you will automatically get on.

This plugin is in testing and will have one or more issues, laid out below:

- You may need to right click on the driver once each time you start the game before the plugin will automount their mount. A fix is being investigated.

Please report issues/bugs and post suggestions on the Github website by clicking the globe icon.
Changelog: - Updated for patch 7.3

Author: Aida Enna
Name: Food Check
Description: See who is missing food buff at countdown start and optionally post to party/echo chat with a customizable message.
Punchline: Someone in our group wouldn't eat their food. I got tired of telling them to. Now the plugin does.
Changelog: - Updated for patch 7.3

Author: Aida Enna
Name: Macro Chain Redux
Description:
Allows for a macro to continue onto the next macro by using '/nextmacro' on the last line of a macro.
Adding '/nextmacro' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #02
Adding '/nextmacro down' on the last line of Macro #01 will automatically execute Macro #11
Also allows executing any macro from chat using '/runmacro'
You can repeat a macro by using /runmacro inside the macro followed by the number of the macro you're editing
Using '/macrocancel' will stop the currently running macro
Punchline: A modified fork of the old Macro Chain that allows you to run multiple macros one after the other (or repeat them).
Changelog: - Updated for patch 7.3

Author: Aida Enna
Name: Portrait Fixer
Description:
When you click "Update Gear Set", this plugin will automatically update and save your portait to match your new glam.

This plugin is in testing and will have one or more issues, laid out below:

- Rarely, a glitched desynth window will pop up when saving the gearset instead of it saving the portait. This is being investigated, closing the window and swapping classes seems to fix it.

Please report issues/bugs and post suggestions on the Github website by clicking the globe icon.
Punchline: Automatically update your portait when your gearset gets updated
Changelog: - Updated for patch 7.3

Author: NightmareXIV, AsunaTsuki
Name: DynamicBridge
Punchline: Allows you to automatically change your appearance based on various conditions.
Description: Automates character appearance changes through rule-based presets, utilizing integration with other popular customization plugins. This enables seamless and context-sensitive transformations, enriching gameplay and increasing immersion.
Changelog: - 7.3 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: HuntTrainAssistant
Punchline: Hunt train assistance tool.
Description: Provides useful tools for hunt trains such as: highlighting conductor messages and muting all other chat, auto-opening flags from conductors and auto-teleporting to announced destination.
Changelog: - Fixed an issue with chat links

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Lifestream
Punchline: A plugin to speed up Aethernet travel and World changing.
Description:
- One click to teleport to any world or aethernet destination
- Click on aetheryte shards inside zone map to teleport to them
Changelog: - Finalize 7.3 update

Resolve eyes position
Wroth flames automarker (whole group and personal)
Tether to your chain partner

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: WeathermanExtras
Punchline: Experimental Weatherman functions.
Description: Experimental Weatherman functions. Use at your own risk.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: TextAdvance
Punchline: Quest speedrunning assistance tool. Automatically skips subtitle boxes and confirms cutscene skipping
Changelog: - 7.3 update

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: AntiAfkKick
Punchline: A Dalamud plugin for preventing being auto-kicked from FFXIV due to inactivity. Install and forget, no config needed.
Description: A Dalamud plugin for preventing being auto-kicked from FFXIV due to inactivity. Install and forget, no config needed.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: SelectString
Punchline: Select items in menus via 0-9 keys rather than mouse.
Description: Numpad is also supported.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Prioritizer
Punchline: Prioritizer sets game's priority to high while crafting.
Description: Prioritizer sets game's priority to high while crafting. No more failed crafts due to random lags while game is minimized.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: UnloadErrorFuckOff
Punchline: [For plugin developers only] A plugin that clears off load and unload errors.
Description: [For plugin developers only] A plugin that clears off load and unload errors. Plugin development is made easy once again!

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: Imagenation
Punchline: An image drawing backend. To be used together with Triggernometry.
Description: An image drawing backend. To be used together with Triggernometry.

Author: NightmareXIV
Name: ObjectExplorer
Punchline: A convenient way to explore current objects around you.
Description: A convenient way to explore current objects around you. Currently supports players only.

Name: StandalonePluginManager
Punchline: Simplifies installation and upgrade process for plugins installed manually.
Description: - Simplifies installation and upgrade process for plugins installed manually.

Name: Battlevest
Punchline: Battle LeveQuest Helper

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselDebug
Description: For developers.
Punchline: Various tools to debug things.
Changelog:
- Fixed: There was a substantial FPS loss when displaying structs with a lot of field due to inheritance checks for type redirects. The result of inheritance checks is now cached.
- Fixed: Hovering over an uninitialized `Character.CompanionObject` to highlight the position would crash the game because VirtualTable was a nullptr.
- Updated: ClientStructs now at 2d10f753 (compare).

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: HaselTweaks
Description: Keep on tweaking.
Punchline: A collection of quality of life tweaks.
Changelog:
Portrait Helper

Reworked a bunch of code regarding Menu Bar and its overlays and how it writes data to the clipboard. Hopefully everything works!

- Fixed: The Portrait Browser, when popped out due to interface scaling, will no longer throw "Cannot access a disposed object." errors and become unusable.

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: LeveHelper
Description: A little helper to check which Levequests have been completed and which are missing.
Punchline: A little helper for Levequests.
Changelog: Update for 7.3 (Dalamud API 13).

Author: Haselnussbomber
Name: Yo-kai Check
Description: Yo-kai Check is a small plugin to assist you in tracking the rewards of the Yo-kai Watch event.
Punchline: Tracking assistant for Yo-kai Watch rewards
Changelog:
- Added: The server info bar entry can not be clicked to open the plugin window.
- Added: The server info bar entry now shows the locations in which you can farm the medals in the tooltip.
- Added: In the table, the medal count of each weapon now also has a tooltip that shows the locations in which you can farm them. A location displayed in a green color is your current location.
- Added: In the table, the minion name can now be clicked to summon it and will be shown in a green color when it is currently summoned.
- Changed: The server info bar entry is now based on the currently summoned minion (previously it was based on inventory changes - the medals that were added) and will persist between zones until the minion is sent away or the weapon has been acquired.

Author: Herculezz, James, erdelf
Name: AutoDuty
Punchline: AutoDuty
Description: A plugin to run dungeons for you with Trust, Duty Support, Squadrons, Variants, and Regular, Requires BossMod, vnavmesh and a Rotation Plugin (BossMod AutoRotation, Wrath or RotationSolverReborn)
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Stylist support by @erdelf in https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/pull/1087
* external plugin configuration adjusted by @erdelf in https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/pull/1088
* fixes for plugin install and active helpers by @erdelf in https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/pull/1089
* RotationPlugin selection by @erdelf in https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/pull/1090
* RSR IPC by @erdelf in https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/pull/1091
* fixup rotation plugin activation by @erdelf in https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/pull/1092
* ImGui selectable fixes by @erdelf in https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/pull/1093
* solo trust leveling by @erdelf in https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/pull/1094
* consider player level in trust solo leveling by @erdelf in https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/pull/1095
* DiscardHelper moved to AutoRetainer by @erdelf in https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/pull/1096
* adjusting leveling mode display by @erdelf in https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/pull/1097


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/ffxivcode/AutoDuty/compare/0.0.0.233...0.0.0.238

Author: The Combat Reborn Team
Name: Rotation Solver Reborn
Description:
Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.

This means almost all the information available in one frame in combat, including the status of all players in the party, the status of any hostile targets, skill cooldowns, the MP and HP of characters, the location of characters, casting status of the hostile target, combo, combat duration, player level, etc.
Then, it will highlight the best action on the hot bar, or help you to click on it.
It is designed for `general combat`, not for savage or ultimate. Use it carefully.
Punchline: Analyses combat information every frame and finds the best action.
Changelog:
## What's Changed
* Hotfix for BLM Aetherial Manipulation and for potential issues with PvE LB being incorrectly activated for some reason by @LTS-FFXIV in https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/pull/971


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/FFXIV-CombatReborn/RotationSolverReborn/compare/7.3.0.51...7.3.0.52

Author: WillWolf76 & The Redheaded Witch
Name: Fashion Report
Punchline: Calculates your points prior to speaking with Masked Rose for the Gold Saucer mini game while also giving you the proper themed pieces that would work! Now includes and Automatic update feature for newly discovered items and shared dye results
Description:
Fashion Report with point calculation system.
Once you check in to see the fashion report for the week, the window will check your gear and tell you how many points you will earn based on what you are wearing. Clicking on a theme will show you the gear for that theme in that slot.
This includes Dyes!!!

/fr - opens up main window.
/fashionreport - Main Window

This project was made possible by a woman who took the time to figure out the proper pointing system and organize the fashion report data for me. She is the heart of this project. Her data made dye calculation possible.

Discovering a new item will automatically update it to the Database, which also updates the ScarBot Discord Fashion Report Generator.

Dye Knowledge is also shared amongst players now!

Author: Ottermandias
Name: Glamourer
Punchline: Change and save appearance of players.
Description: Adds functionality to change and store appearance of players, customization and equip. Requires Penumbra to be installed and activated to work. Can also add preview options to the Changed Items tab for Penumbra.

Author: Ottermandias, Adam, Wintermute
Name: Penumbra
Punchline: Runtime mod loader and manager.
Description: Runtime mod loader and manager.

Author: Risa
Name: Customize+
Description: A plugin that allows you to customize your character beyond FFXIV limitations by directly editing bone parameters.
Punchline: Customize your character beyond FFXIV's limitations.

Author: Caraxi
Name: Simple Heels
Description: Adjust the position of your character model
Punchline: Adjust the position of your character model

Author: Anna
Changelog:
- Fix certain minor errors not being retried
- Improve performance while installing large mods
- Fix install prompt only showing one per-mod update setting
- Add per-mod update settings to Penumbra window
- Change update process to be faster for larger mods
- Use less disk space for updates on filesystems without hard link support
- Add option to collapse Heliosphere settings in Penumbra by default
- Make Heliosphere settings collapsible on a per-mod basis in Penumbra

Note that updates for larger mods are still fairly slow, but a redundant step is
now skipped. Please report any bugs with the new update system (or install
failures) to our forums: https://forums.heliosphere.app/
Description:
Heliosphere is a mod manager and platform designed to work directly with
Penumbra. It enables efficient downloads and fast installs to let you get back
to the fun part of mods: using them.

Heliosphere supports:
- Direct install to Penumbra
- Compressed and deduplicated (read: small) downloads
- Automatic updates (optional)
- Version history
- Mod changelogs
- Pictures in Penumbra
- And more

Give Heliosphere a try, and see if you can't say goodbye to any old mod
platform you were using before.
Name: Heliosphere
Punchline: An efficient mod manager and platform that integrates directly with Penumbra.
TestingChangelog:
- Fix a possible error in the multiple directory warning
- Fix updates for mods with duplicated files
- Add a first-time-user setup window to make onboarding easier

Author: VariableVixen
Name: TinyCommands
Description: Adds tiny and simple but useful chat commands, and nothing more. It doesn't even have a UI.

Author: VariableVixen
Name: XivEsp
Description: If you've ever spent ten minutes looking for your hunt target, this is the plugin for you. Set a case-insensitive substring, glob, or regular expression, and all nearby game objects with matching names will be tagged on your screen!

Author: attick, daemitus, VariableVixen
Name: XIV Combo Very Expanded
Description: This plugin condenses combos and mutually exclusive abilities onto a single button. To a degree that some would call absurd, but that's why it's all configurable. Let the players decide.

Description: Provides a list of all FATEs in the current zone, with their type, sorted by maximum level and distance from you.
